title: Ticket #783: New param() interface for grand unified param system (7.5)
description:
For 7.5.0, the new grand unified param system (#123) should not be used for existing param() and param_*() calls. The interface should work as it always has, with the possible exception of #758.

Instead:

  1. Create a new interface (param2_boolean() ?) for the new system
  2. Walk the code examining every call site to param* and converting it to param2. Use this as an opportunity to ensure that the grand unified table correctly reflects the existing code behavior.
  3. When all of the old calls have been found and replaced, delete the old interface.
